The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are missing and only body parts and a feeding pit is all that's left of them. When another group is sent in to investigate, they find a man digging up lost bodies to sell them on the black market.
It's hard to tell what the bad guys want. Nothing makes sense with the romance angle either
